# Welcome, I'm Mark Barrett.

I am an analyst with a passion for behavioural science, R, and public policy. This is my personal website where I will showcase what I have learned and how I approach the research process.

You can find me on [GitHub](https://github.com/MokeEire) and [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Mmm_JuicyFruit).
